trap_door.name: Trap Door
trap_door.player_message: You just fell through a trap door in the floor!
trap_door.arrive_message: {0} has just fallen into the room through a trap door in the ceiling!
trap_door.depart_message: {0} has just fallen through a trap door in the floor!

flash_of_light.name: Flash of Light
flash_of_light.player_message: A sudden flash of light momentarily blinds you!
flash_of_light.arrive_message: {0} has just appeared in a blinding flash of light!
flash_of_light.depart_message: {0} has just vanished in a blinding flash of light!

black_smoke.name: Black Smoke
black_smoke.player_message: A cloud of thick black smoke suddenly engulfs you!
black_smoke.arrive_message: {0} has just appeared in a puff of thick black smoke!
black_smoke.depart_message: {0} has just vanished in a puff of thick black smoke!

pressure_plate.name: Pressure Plate
pressure_plate.player_message: A spring loaded pressure plate rapidly lifts you through the ceiling!
pressure_plate.arrive_message: {0} just appeared suddenly through an aperature in the floor!
pressure_plate.depart_message: {0} was just lifted rapidly through the ceiling on a column of stone!
